text: Although our site is very popular , the current economic climate has reduced our revenues just when we need extra security to prevent attacks from hackers who do n't like what we do .If you think what we do is worthwhile , please donate or become a member .Unlike the MPAA we do not assign one inscrutable rating based on age , but 3 objective ratings for SEX / NUDITY , VIOLENCE / GORE and PROFANITY on a scale of 0 to 10 , from lowest to highest , depending on quantity and context .Seven testosterone - filled friends make a bet that the last of them to get married will be the lucky one to win a large pot of cash as a reward for preserving his bachelorhood .

[ 1:32 ] .SEX / NUDITY 10 - Lots and lots of sexual innuendo , including references to oral sex , masturbation , S&M , multiple - partner sex , sex with twin sisters , bestiality , homosexuality , casual sex , sex with kids , and anal sex .Several passionate kissing scenes and several sex scenes .Preparing for sex , a man spanks a woman 's bare buttocks ( she 's in a thong ) and the woman asks if she can get a friend to join them ; the friend obliges and it 's implied they 'll have a ménage - à - trois .

We see two scantily clad women having sex on a bed , with one woman behind the other rubbing and moving .A man in thong underwear on his bed spanks his own buttocks and talks dirty to himself .A man lying in bed pulls off his underwear and it 's implied he 's going to masturbate .A couple kiss passionately , begin disrobing and recline on a bed ; but then the woman turns into a dominatrix and handcuffs the man , bites him , strips him and whips him ( we see shots of his bare buttocks a couple of times ) .

We see the silhouette of what seems to be two naked women having sex ( and making sex noises ) .A woman performs fellatio on a man while he 's driving a car .Two men go to a sperm bank ; for a long time we watch a man masturbate ( we see numerous stroking gestures and facial expressions but no genitalia ) .A man kisses a woman 's cleavage ( she 's lying down in a bra ) .We see the bare shoulders and backs of two obviously naked people having sex .Twice ( in the movie itself and in outtakes shown during the end credits ) , we see a man on top of a naked woman ( we see her bare breasts ) having sex with her ( she makes loud moaning noises ) .

We see the silhouette of what appears to be one naked woman rubbing her hand on another naked woman 's breasts .We see three women under the sheets having sex and then they ask a man to join them ; he excitedly takes off his shirt .We see several shots of a man in only his underwear .A woman handcuffs a man to a bed and then another woman comes into the room with a strap - on phallus and shoves it up the man 's anus ( we see his pained face right after she gets behind him ) .

A man is on top of a woman almost ready to kiss her and then stops .Men in a wedding party drink an erection - enhancing drug and all display prominent erections during the ceremony ( the pastor looks curiously at the men 's erections ) .A man approaches a prostitute and unzips his pants , pulling out a carrot .Two gay men briefly kiss .In a cartoon , a woman spreads her legs and there 's a brain where her vagina should be .A woman rubs dice in her cleavage and hands them to a man for good luck .

An elderly woman grabs a man 's clothed buttocks .We see several scantily clad women and lots of cleavage throughout the movie .VIOLENCE / GORE 6 - Threatening with guns , and several shots fired .A man is shot and falls down a flight of stairs and dies ; also , a man is shot in the chest and another is shot in the back ( both are killed ) .A man dangles from a cliff face and then falls off ( he 's unharmed ) .A man threatens to kill and castrate another man .

A man has a testicle surgically removed .A woman hikes up her leg and a baby comes out that looks like a man .A woman vomits .We see a few clear jars filled with semen .A man has a scarlet " A " welted on his buttock after being paddled .We also see a few instances of sex - related violence and gore ; see the Sex / Nudity category for details .Your browser does not support inline frames or is currently configured not to display inline frames .PROFANITY 8 - About 15 F - words , lots of anatomical and scatological references , lots of mild obscenities , lots of crude humor and references to genitalia ( slang terms ) , a few insults .

DISCUSSION TOPICS - Sex , love , commitment , marriage , infidelity , prostitution , deception , gambling .A CAVEAT : We 've gone through several editorial changes since we started covering films in 1992 and some of our early standards were not as stringent as they are now .We therefore need to revisit many older reviews , especially those written prior to 1998 or so ; please keep this in mind if you 're consulting a review from that period .While we plan to revisit and correct older reviews our resources are limited and it is a slow , time - consuming process .

We have little control over ads since we belong to ad agencies that serve ads automatically ; a standing order should prevent provocative ads , but inappropriate ads do sneak in .What you can do .Become a member : You can subscribe for as little as a couple of dollars a month and gain access to our premium site , which contains no ads whatsoever .Think about it : You 'll be helping support our site and guarantee that we will continue to publish , and you will be able to browse without any commercial interruptions .
